trigger: Transcriptional and posttranscriptional regulation of erythroid gene expression in anthracycline - induced differentiation of human erythroleukemic cells .
Transcriptional and posttranscriptional regulation of erythroid gene expression in anthracycline - induced differentiation of human erythroleukemic cells .
Aclacinomycin ( ACLA ) and doxorubicin ( DOX ) were used at subtoxic concentrations to induce erythroid differentiation in the human leukemic cell line K562 .
